    • Method Detail

      • setFeedListener

        public void setFeedListener(Feed.FeedListener callback)

      • getState

        public int getState()

      • setStateDefault

        public void setStateDefault()
        Set the current state to STATE_DEFAULT.

      • setStateCourse

        public void setStateCourse(SubscriptionItem subItem)
        Set the current state to STATE_SINGLE_COURSE. Only reviews from that course will be returned.
        Parameters:
        subItem - The course to be filtered.

      • setStateLecture

        public void setStateLecture(java.lang.String hash)
        Set the current state to STATE_SINGLE_LECTURE. Only reviews from a single lecture will be included.
        Parameters:
        hash - The hash of the lecture to be filtered.

      • update

        public void update(int first,
          int count)
        Update the current set of items based on the state. The FeedListener is notified via "onFeedUpdate()". If an error occurred, the passed ArrayList<..> will contain zero elements.
        Parameters:
        first - The number of items to ignore.
        count - The maximum amount of items to be returned.

      • loadMore

        public void loadMore(int lastId,
            int count)
        Load more items based on the current state. The FeedListener is notified via "onFeedUpdate()". If an error occurred, the passed ArrayList<..> will contain zero elements.
        Parameters:
        lastId - The ID of the last item in the previously returned set.
        count - The maximum amount of items to be returned.

      • onGetFeedFailure

        public void onGetFeedFailure(java.lang.String errorMessage)
        Specified by:

        Specified by:
